meanings.sent1: The analogousnesses between the two stories made it easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The state of being similar in function or character.
meanings.sent1: The analogousnesses in their roles made them a great team.
meanings.sent2: The siblings shared a strong sense of analogousnesses in their personalities.
meanings.sent3: The movie plot relied on the analogousnesses between the main characters.
meanings.sent4: The analogousnesses in their work ethic were admirable.
meanings.sent5: The analogousnesses between the two machines were evident in their design.

meanings.sent1: The analogousnesses in their handwriting made it hard to tell them apart.
